EmailTemplate.name: 16.Radio.AirScale.AirScal.N.G.N.2351.B.Email 3 - 4.5G WP & Video
EmailTemplate.subject: Three steps to 5G - we’ve mapped it all out for you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Begin your journey to 5G today AirScale Radio Access <[[https://pages.nokia.com/2198.Path_To_5G.html]]> Start today with 4.5G Pro, the first step to 5G Getting to 5G isn’t a leap of faith. Take it step-by-step to protect your investments and win revenue along the way.
Nokia AirScale is ready to power your network evolution to 5G. Read the white paper <[[https://pages.nokia.com/2198.Path_To_5G.html]]> ► Add new capabilities to your LTE network to create 5G-like experiences in three stages:
- Go beyond mainstream mobile broadband with 4.5G - Deploy 4.5G Pro to deliver gigabit peak data rates - Upgrade to 4.9G to further boost capacity and achieve speeds up to several gigabits per second
The opportunities are enormous, but the journey to 5G needs to start now. <[[https://resources.nokia.com/asset/200820]]> New services with 4.5G, 4.5G Pro and 4.9G The path to 5G is not just about enhancing technology. It’s about using new network performance to pioneer services in IoT, broadcasting, vehicle connectivity and public safety. Watch the video <[[https://resources.nokia.com/asset/200820]]> ► © 2016 Nokia.
